content.question: Which of the following might explain why Jefferson wrote this letter to Rufus King?

choices.label: The overthrow of slavery on the island of Saint Domingue could serve as inspiration for further insurrections in the United States.
The escape of enslaved people from the North to sanctuary in Spanish Florida could negatively affect local businesses.
The expansion of maroon communities in Virginia and North Carolina could alienate and isolate African Americans.
The migration of enslaved people to free territories in Canada could be the onset of mass northern emigration.

content.answer: The overthrow of slavery on the island of Saint Domingue could serve as inspiration for further insurrections in the United States.
